<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[School Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=3026) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 241 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=103)

**Prerequisites**
[Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=633); [Runelord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3020)

</column>

---

Your intricate knowledge of your school lets you easily negate spells from that school. Instead of being able to counter a foe's spell with Counterspell only if you have the same spell prepared, if the foe casts a spell from the school matching your specialization, you can Counterspell it with any other spell of the same school.
name: School Counterspell
